name: Chili’s Roasted Street Corn
description: Chili's Street Corn is tasty corn on the cob that's seasoned, roasted, and covered in cheese. Get the easy copycat recipe to make it at home.
ingredients: 4 ears corn shucked and silks removed
1/4 teaspoon paprika plus an extra pinch for the mayonnaise
instructions: Preheat the oven to 425°F.In a small bowl, combine the melted butter, paprika, and chili powder.Place 4 pieces of aluminum foil on the countertop, large enough to wrap each ear of corn. Place an ear of corn on each piece of foil and spoon 2 to 3 teaspoons of seasoned butter over each ear of corn. Wrap the corn with the foil.Place the wrapped corn on a baking sheet and bake for 30 minutes, until the corn has browned slightly.While the corn is cooking, combine the mayonnaise, sour cream, lime juice, and a tiny pinch of paprika in a small bowl. Mix well.Remove the corn from the foil and spread the mayonnaise over the corn. Sprinkle with cotija cheese and cilantro.
